Query:
SELECT
					 smdn.mdn,
				     p.PartnerCode,
				     CASE
				    	WHEN p.PartnerStatus = 0 THEN 'Initialized'
				    	WHEN p.PartnerStatus = 1 THEN 'Active'
				    	WHEN p.PartnerStatus = 2 THEN 'PendingRetirement'
				    	WHEN p.PartnerStatus = 3 THEN 'Retired'
				    	WHEN p.PartnerStatus = 4 THEN 'Registered'
				    	WHEN p.PartnerStatus = 5 THEN 'Suspend'
				    	WHEN p.PartnerStatus = 6 THEN 'InActive'
					 END,
					 CASE
				    	WHEN p.BusinessPartnerType = 0 THEN 'ServicePartner'
				    	WHEN p.BusinessPartnerType = 1 THEN 'SolutionPartner'
				    	WHEN p.BusinessPartnerType = 2 THEN 'RegulatoryBody'
				    	WHEN p.BusinessPartnerType = 3 THEN 'BranchOffice'
				    	WHEN p.BusinessPartnerType = 4 THEN 'DirectAgent'
			    		WHEN p.BusinessPartnerType = 5 THEN 'SuperAgent'
			    		WHEN p.BusinessPartnerType = 6 THEN 'SubRetailAgent'
			    		WHEN p.BusinessPartnerType = 7 THEN 'Merchant'
				    	WHEN p.BusinessPartnerType = 8 THEN 'Biller'
				    	WHEN p.BusinessPartnerType = 9 THEN 'CorporateUser'
					 END,
					 u.UserName,
					 p.TradeName,
					 p.IndustryClassification,
					 a.Line1,
					 a.Line2,
				     a.City,
				     a.State,
				     a.ZipCode,
					 p.RepresentativeName,
					 p.Designation,
					 p.FranchisePhoneNumber,
					 p.FaxNumber,
					 p.TypeOfOrganization,
					 DATE_FORMAT(p.CreateTime, ${DateTimeFormat}),
					 DATE_FORMAT(p.LastUpdateTime, ${DateTimeFormat}),
					 p.AuthorizedEmail
				FROM
				     partner p INNER JOIN subscriber s ON s.ID = p.SubscriberID 
					 INNER JOIN subscriber_mdn smdn ON s.ID = smdn.SubscriberID
					 INNER JOIN mfino_user u on p.UserID = u.ID
				     LEFT OUTER JOIN address a ON s.SubscriberAddressID = a.ID
				WHERE
				     p.CreateTime < ${EndTime}
				     AND p.CreateTime >= ${StartTime}
				     AND p.BusinessPartnerType like ${PartnerType}
